name: diala-unified
description: Unified startup for Diala backend services

scripts.audio: cd backend/audio_generator_service && . venv_audio/bin/activate && python -c "import uvicorn; uvicorn.run('main:app', host='0.0.0.0', port=8001, reload=False)"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:audio
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:audio: cd backend/audio_generator_service && . venv_audio/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
